name: Google
restriction: Core search services blocked or heavily censored in Iran

name: YouTube
restriction: Permanently blocked in Iran; state foreign‑ministry accounts terminated by YouTube

name: Bing
restriction: Search results and services censored or inaccessible in Iran

name: Spotify
restriction: Service blocked or inaccessible; Iranian IPs routinely geo‑blocked

name: SoundCloud
restriction: Access restricted/censored for users in Iran

name: Instagram
restriction: Blocked since September 2022; intermittent temporary access possible

name: Telegram
restriction: Blocked since 2018; used via VPNs; still widely popular

name: WhatsApp
restriction: Blocked during protests (2022); lifted late 2024; still partially urged to avoid usage

name: X (Twitter)
restriction: Blocked in Iran; widely accessed via VPNs

name: LinkedIn
restriction: Blocked since 2009; remains inaccessible without VPN

name: Discord
restriction: Censored/blocked in Iran along with other messaging platforms
